Greetings.message: I wish you to celebrate all the wonderful things that make you so special, so loving not just on your special day, but on every day of the year!
I wish you receive an extra reason to smile for every extra candle on your cake. Happy Birthday to you!
May the day be full of excitement and joy. May you overcome all obstacles in your life and continue to tread on the path of success.
Hope all of your dearest wishes come true Because no one deserves it more than you do!
May your special day bring you sounds of happy laughter, warmth of smiling faces and feeling of being loved!
It doesn't matter how old you really are, you look amazing on Facebook profile photo! Happy Bday to you!
Wishing that may you get all the good things in life. May you home always be filled with love, happiness, and prosperity. Have a wonderful birthday.
Sending you warm wishes and lots of love on your birthday. May you have a wonderful time. Happy birthday.
It is time to look towards the future and forget the past for there are many good things that are yet to come in your life. A very happy birthday.
It's the final countdown, The Final Countdown! Have a wonderful birthday and an exciting year ahead.
